articles.author: Damien Pine
articles.title: MIT's high-tech ‘bubble wrap’ turns air into safe drinking water — even in Death Valley - Live Science
articles.description: Researchers at MIT have tested a new technology for turning water vapor in the atmosphere into drinkable water, even in extreme environments.
articles.content:
MIT researchers have created a high-tech “bubble wrap” capable of collecting safe drinking water directly from the air — even in Death Valley, the driest desert in North America.

articles.title: A neural brain implant provides near instantaneous speech - Ars Technica
articles.description: Focusing on sound production instead of word choice makes for a flexible system.
